Title: One of Us Now
RewardText: You're just the type of adventurer we want in our expedition, and we're so glad to have you! To show our appreciation, I'd like to reward you with our tabard. It'll show the world everything you've accomplished! We can't forget our roots, though--if you'd like a banner for the Reliquary or the Explorers' League, I have those available as well. Thank you for everything you've done!
